CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 28, 1945, pg. 1, reads: "Winner! Mrs. Alma Illery, names by the Business and Professional Association as one of the five outstanding Pittsburghers, at its banquet last week, is shown receiving one of the many floral gifts tendered her at the affair.  Mrs. George E. A. Fairley, wife of the Directory of Public Safety, pins on a corsage from the Achievement Clubs.  (Other winners on Page 13.) - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Alma Illery, recipient of an outstanding Pittsburgher award from the Business and Professional Association of Pittsburgh, posed with bouquets at banquet in YMCA
